title: Space Cafe Coffee Shop Website - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create hero section with headline, subheadline, and two CTA buttons
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the headline prominently with sparkle emojis
Subheadline appears below the headline
Two CTA buttons are visible and styled appropriately
Hero image is displayed as the background or focal point

file_operations.description: Create Hero component with headline '✨ Space Cafe Coffee Shop – Your Cosmic Coffee Escape ✨', subheadline 'Cozy vibes, handcrafted coffee, and delicious treats that make every visit unforgettable.', and two CTA buttons labeled 'Visit Us Today' and 'Order Online'. Use the generated hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-cafe.dim_1920x800.png as the background.
Import and render the Hero component at the top of the main page layout.

requirements.summary: Create About Us section with cafe description and promise statement
acceptanceCriteria: About Us section is clearly labeled
All provided text is displayed in a readable format
The promise statement is highlighted or emphasized

file_operations.description: Create About component displaying the section text: 'At Space Cafe, we believe coffee is more than a drink – it's an experience. From rich espresso and creamy cappuccinos to unique iced lattes and specialty drinks, our menu is designed to delight every taste. Enjoy our freshly baked chocolate cake, savory sandwiches, and healthy drink options while soaking in a cozy, stylish atmosphere perfect for work, hangouts, or a quiet coffee break.' Include emphasized promise: 'Quality, comfort, and a welcoming vibe for everyone.'
Import and render the About component below the Hero section.

requirements.summary: Create Menu Highlights section with coffee/drinks and desserts/snacks categories
acceptanceCriteria: Menu is organized into two clear categories
Each item displays its name and description
Special note is visible and distinct from menu items

file_operations.description: Create Menu component with two categories: 'Coffee & Drinks' (Americano - Classic & smooth, Flat White - Nutty and creamy, Iced Latte - Refreshing & flavorful, Matcha Latte - Unique and vibrant, Cappuccino with Almond Milk - Deliciously dairy-free) and 'Desserts & Snacks' (Chocolate Cake - Customer favorite, Zafaran Cake - Delightful & fragrant, Oreo Truffles - Must-try indulgence, Turkey Sandwich - Perfect savory bite). Include special note: 'Ask about our seasonal and healthy options!'
Import and render the Menu component below the About section.

requirements.summary: Create Gallery section showcasing cafe images with captions
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays generated images in a grid or carousel layout
Images represent the four categories mentioned
At least one caption is displayed in the gallery section

file_operations.description: Create Gallery component displaying images of latte art (frontend/public/assets/generated/latte-art.dim_800x600.png), specialty drinks (frontend/public/assets/generated/matcha-latte.dim_800x600.png), chocolate and Zafaran cakes (frontend/public/assets/generated/chocolate-cake.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/zafaran-cake.dim_800x600.png), sandwiches and snacks (frontend/public/assets/generated/oreo-truffles.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/turkey-sandwich.dim_800x600.png), and cozy seating (frontend/public/assets/generated/cozy-seating.dim_800x600.png). Include caption 'Cozy corners, delightful flavors.' or 'Where every sip and bite feels special.'
Import and render the Gallery component below the Menu section.

requirements.summary: Create Reviews/Testimonials section with four 5-star Google reviews
acceptanceCriteria: Four testimonials are displayed with 5-star ratings
Each review shows the quote and reviewer name
CTA button links to Google reviews or displays appropriately

file_operations.description: Create Reviews component displaying four 5-star reviews: '"The chocolate cake was amazing, and the iced latte was so good!" – Mohamad C.', '"Superb coffee and superb hospitality. Cozy & comfortable." – Minhaj S.', '"Nice place, good vibes, and beautiful atmosphere." – Mim J.', '"In love with their Oreo truffles and matcha drinks." – Dhari B.' Include CTA button labeled 'See More Reviews on Google'.
Import and render the Reviews component below the Gallery section.

requirements.summary: Create Contact & Location section with hours, parking info, contact form, and social links
acceptanceCriteria: Contact section displays hours and parking information
Contact form includes Name, Email, and Message fields
Social media links are displayed with appropriate icons
Both CTA buttons are visible and styled

file_operations.description: Create Contact component with placeholders for address and phone number, hours 'Mon-Sun: 7 AM – 9 PM', parking info 'Best parking at Baladiya lot across the street.', a contact form with fields for Name, Email, and Message, placeholder social links for Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok, and CTA buttons 'Get Directions' and 'Message Us'.
Import and render the Contact component below the Reviews section.

requirements.summary: Create footer with newsletter subscription form
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays the promotional text
Newsletter subscription form includes email input field
Subscribe Now button is prominently displayed

file_operations.description: Create Footer component with text 'Stay Connected & Enjoy Cosmic Coffee! Subscribe for updates, seasonal drinks, and special treats.' and a newsletter subscription form with email input field and 'Subscribe Now' button.
Import and render the Footer component at the bottom of the page layout.

requirements.summary: Implement warm, cosmic-inspired visual design theme throughout the website
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme consistently uses warm browns, creams, purples, and gold
Typography is cohesive across all sections
Layout feels inviting and spacious
Design reflects both coffee shop warmth and cosmic theme

file_operations.description: Update global styles to implement warm, cosmic-inspired color palette using rich browns, creams, deep purples, and gold accents. Define CSS variables for consistent theming across components.

Extend Tailwind configuration with custom color palette (warm browns, creams, deep purples, gold accents) and typography settings using elegant fonts for headings and readable sans-serif for body text to create a cohesive cosmic coffee shop theme.

requirements.summary: Render all generated gallery and hero images as static assets
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated
Components correctly reference image paths
All images load successfully in the UI

file_operations.description: Ensure Hero component correctly references the generated hero image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-cafe.dim_1920x800.png using the appropriate image loading approach for static assets.

Ensure Gallery component correctly references all generated images in frontend/public/assets/generated directory: latte-art.dim_800x600.png, chocolate-cake.dim_800x600.png, zafaran-cake.dim_800x600.png, oreo-truffles.dim_800x600.png, turkey-sandwich.dim_800x600.png, cozy-seating.dim_800x600.png, and matcha-latte.dim_800x600.png using the appropriate image loading approach for static assets.
